tool_description: Get Medium posts in JSON format.
name: medium-feed-api
title: medium-feed-api

api_list.name: Feed
api_list.description: Retrieve Medium posts for a given account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://medium-feed-api.p.rapidapi.com/Medium"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medium-feed-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://medium-feed-api.p.rapidapi.com/{account}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medium-feed-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
